Package com.luismarques99.productbuysapi.controllers

Class DetailController

java.lang.Object
com.luismarques99.productbuysapi.controllers.DetailController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/v1/details") public class DetailController extends Object
Class that represents the structure of a REST Controller for the Detail domain. It holds the response given for each request.
Author:
Luis Marques

  • Method Details

    • getAllDetails

      @GetMapping("") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<DetailResponse>> getAllDetails()
      Returns an ok response with a list of all details.
      Returns:
      list of detail responses.

    • getDetailById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<DetailResponse> getDetailById(@PathVariable Long id) throws DetailNotFoundException
      Returns an ok response with the detail found with the provided id.
      Parameters:
      id - numerical identifier
      Returns:
      Detail Response.
      Throws:
      DetailNotFoundException - if there is no detail with the requested id, an exception is thrown.

    • getDetailsByExpressionContainedInDescription

      @GetMapping(path="", params="expression") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<DetailResponse>> getDetailsByExpressionContainedInDescription(@RequestParam(required=false) String expression)
      Returns an ok response with the details that contain a text expression in the description.
      Parameters:
      expression - text expression.
      Returns:
      list of DetailResponse.

    • createNewDetail

      @PostMapping("") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<DetailResponse> createNewDetail(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid DetailCreateRequest detailCreateRequest) throws DetailAlreadyExistingException
      Returns a created response with the URI for the created detail with the requested data.
      Parameters:
      detailCreateRequest - detail create request
      Returns:
      created detail response.
      Throws:
      DetailAlreadyExistingException - if there is an equal detail existing, an exception is thrown.

    • updateDetail

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> updateDetail(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid DetailUpdateRequest detailUpdateRequest) throws DetailNotFoundException, DetailAlreadyExistingException
      Returns a no content response after updating a detail identified by its id with the requested data.
      Parameters:
      id - numerical identifier.
      detailUpdateRequest - detail update request.
      Returns:
      no content response.
      Throws:
      DetailNotFoundException - if there is no detail with the requested id, an exception is thrown.
      DetailAlreadyExistingException - if there is an equal detail existing, an exception is thrown.

    • deleteDetail

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteDetail(@PathVariable Long id) throws DetailNotFoundException
      Returns a no content response after deleting a detail identified by its id.
      Parameters:
      id - numerical identifier.
      Returns:
      no content response.
      Throws:
      DetailNotFoundException - if there is no detail with the requested id, an exception is thrown.
